title: Head of Global Real Estate and Facilities
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Head of Global Real Estate and Facilities 

Lead the Global Real Estate and facilities across NICE.
Manage Global annual budget and the ongoing spending optimization and tracking.
Responsible for NICE’s Global operational accommodation and facilities management
Manage, Develop, implement and maintain a systematic Real Estate portfolio and support with lease-related activities – including lease renewals, termination, exit point, etc.). Prepare business cases assessing different scenarios and balancing the business needs with the financial optimization. Prepare and drive reviews and presentations with the executive team.
In the Post Covid Era the head of Global Real Estate and Facilities will drive the alignment Nice Flex attendance policy with the infrastructure needs
Real Estate database management
Manage a team of 3-4 direct reports and overall group of ~25 facilities professionals and office managers as well as sub-contractors and consultants.
Partner and work with regional site managers, HR functions, IT, Procurement and Finance within the job needs.
Oversee and Own facilities management audit and improvement programs.
Ensure reliable cost-effective services are provided according to best practice Balance between service SLA and financial optimization.
Operate and maintain facilities in a manner compliant with corporate and statutory health and safety policies, regulations and procedures.
Act as the escalation point for any NICE issues related to Facilities and Real Estates. Own the Facilities continuity program and plan.

 
Education:

Economic, Business Management or similar degree – mandatory
Law degree / attorney – advantage

 
Requirements:

10+ years of experience in Real Estate and Facilities senior roles
Proven experience in preparing and managing complex budgets.
Excellent communication skills in English
Team player, proactive, result oriented, with a “can-do” attitude in meeting critical deadlines.
Experience with global corporate activities
Flexible approach to travel and hours worked.
Negotiation skills

 
#LI-HybridAbout NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.
